title: Pulp Modern: Die Laughing
overview: Adulterous L.A. Deejay Mr.C spins five tales of malice and deceit: A millennial slasher, a demonic mirror, the dark half of a literary doomsayer, a satanic parrot, and a vengeful wife scorned. Featuring film adaptations of works by Stephen King, Nicole Bird, and Alec Cizak. Based on the world's most enduring underground pulp fiction digest magazine, Pulp Modern.
